Title: Data & Image Generator for Slide.Show
Description: Generates 'data.xml' and necessary web image assets (resized images) for a Slide.Show, reading metadata from your images and providing a graphical interface to customize the Slide.Show output content.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Generates 'data.xml' and necessary web image assets (resized images) for a Slide.Show, reading metadata from your images and providing a graphical interface to customize the Slide.Show output content.



For some discussion of motivations, see http://www.benhoffman.us/default.asp?display=16.

Make sure to grab .NET 3.5 : http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=333325fd-ae52-4e35-b531-508d977d32a6&displaylang=en

Source code requires VS2008.
